item.title: LLM to SQL Group Project
item.description: Here is the source code and post for my LLM to SQL group project for a Database class. https://github.com/pined1/LLM_SQL Natural Language SQL Project Purpose of the Database My database models vendor and product data for a marketplace application, which includes vendors, their products, customer ratings, and orders. Schema Query I thought it did well on Question: Which vendors have the highest rating? GPT SQL Response: SELECT Vendors.VendorID, Vendors.VendorName, MAX(Ratings.RatingValue) as MaxRating FROM Vendors INNER JOIN Ratings ON Vendors.
